title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 166-2.10 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 166-2.10 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) There shall
be no fees charged for: (1)
inspection of
records; (2)
search for records; or
(3)
certification that a
transcript is a true copy of records copied, that the division is not the legal
custodian for the records sought or that the records, which are in the custody
of the division, cannot be found. (b) The fee for photocopies not to exceed 8
1/2 by 14 inches shall be 25 cents per page. Fees for copies of records other
than photocopies which are 8 1/2by 14 inches or less in size shall be the
actual cost of copying, excluding fixed agency costs such as
salaries. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
166-2.10

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
